title: WBUS Beta
description: WBUS provides a list of nearby bus, ETA(Expected time of arrival) information, destination settings and notifications to user.Based on the current location, you can check the current location and the next stop of your bus.Beta version. Local support is not yet complete.Support Country :, Seoul, Busan, Incheon, Cheonan, AsanYou can participate to complete bus database. https://github.com/jeonghunn/wbus_db
descriptionHTML:
WBUS provides a list of nearby bus, ETA(Expected time of arrival) information, destination settings and notifications to user.

Based on the current location, you can check the current location and the next stop of your bus.

Beta version. Local support is not yet complete.
Support Country :, Seoul, Busan, Incheon, Cheonan, Asan

You can participate to complete bus database.

https://github.com/jeonghunn/wbus_db
recentChanges: - Automatically Select when no need to select
